content:
We're about half way through the month, and if we want updates in time for the july planning meeting, starting now seems like a good idea.

Was there a plan for doing so?

cc @nikomatsakis @Josh Triplett
I had a plan, but I got way delayed in executing it
I suppose I can just fall back to the old technique of manually posting pings
My hope was to implement enough of the script to automate that or at least move it along
@Josh Triplett would you be up to take this on?
@nikomatsakis Taking on the pings, or the automation?

@nikomatsakis following up, but don't need to talk now -- I personally think asking for updates late this week / early next week is around the right timeline for getting them; I would specifically say to folks that they have a few weeks. I agree that the shepherds taking a more active role in guiding that work and presenting minutes/notes/summaries would be ideal, but it seems unlikely we can pull that off in two weeks -- maybe I am wrong on that aspect, though.
